title: Amanda Holden wears novelty giraffe jumper as she exits Global Radio studios
text:
Amanda Holden injected a bit of fun to her look when she was pictured leaving the Global Radio studios in London on Thursday.

The 48-year-old looked zoo-tiful wearing a novelty giraffe jumper under a bright red coat.

She slipped her lean legs into a form-fitting pair of leather trousers and elongated her limbs with a pair of court shoes.

You're having a giraffe! Amanda Holden wore a novelty animal jumper as she exited the Global Radio in London on Thursday, wearing a sexy leather trousers and heels

Amanda looked every inch the celebrity as she hid her eyes behind a pair of designer shades.

She was followed closely by radio co-star Ashley Roberts, who wore a tight white top tucked into acid-wash black jeans.

The former Pussycat Dolls star slipped on a fashion forward plaid shirt over the top and wore her blonde locks in a bun high on her head.

Chic: Amanda looked every inch the celebrity as she hid her eyes behind a pair of designer shades, (left) before being closely followed by Ashley Roberts (right)

Quids in: The mother-of-two reportedly landed a £3million contract to host the Heart Radio Breakfast Show

The mother-of-two reportedly landed a £3million contract to host the Heart Radio Breakfast Show.

But it was her youngest daughter Hollie, who stole the show when she interviewed Hollywood A-listers Angelina Jolie and Elle Fanning recently (it was aired on Thursday).

Amanda said she was 'worried for her job' as Hollie, seven, made her interview debut with the Maleficent: Mistress of Evil stars.

Rising star: Amanda was an extremely proud mum as her youngest daughter Hollie, seven, interviewed Hollywood A-listers Angelina Jolie and Elle Fanning recently

The Heart Radio presenter shared a sweet group snap of herself and Hollie posing with Angelina, 44, and Elle, 21.

Amanda captioned the snap: 'I’m worried for my job!! [Hollie]is a natural!'

The star also shared a second snap of the youngster with the two acclaimed actresses with the caption: '#HRH takes over This Is Heart Breakfast.'

Cute: The star also shared a second snap of the youngster with the two acclaimed actresses with the caption: '#HRH takes over This Is Heart Breakfast'

Banter: The TV star, 48, joked she was 'worried for her job' as Hollie made her radio interview debut with the Maleficent: Mistress of Evil star

Amanda said to the actresses: 'The film is very much about family and how we don’t have to kind of be built in the same way in order to be united and again, I just think this film is so full of amazing positive messages for younger people.

'How important is it for you to play roles that kind of, and not in a sort of heavy way, but kind of really gently give a lovely message to young people?'

Angelina responded: 'Oh absolutely especially when you know that a large part of the audience are young, I think usually it’s the adults that need to be reminded of these messages because you guys kind of already know, but it’s really important to strengthen these messages for the young.'

Discussing her six children - of which three are adopted - she added: 'And the message that family’s not just blood you know. Half of my children are not my blood and they are absolutely my family and my children and I love them so much.
description: Amanda Holden injected a bit of fun to her look when she was pictured leaving the Global Radio studios in London on Thursday.
